name: @otr-app/shared-backend-generated-client
description: Generate client-side and service-side code using swagger CLI
author: Off the Record, Inc.

scripts.clean-source: find dist/typescript -type f | grep -v  "\.d\.ts\|\.js" | xargs rm
scripts.ts-client: gulp codegen && openapi-generator-cli generate -i api/otr-service.json -o dist/typescript -g typescript-angularjs
scripts.generate:devo: npm run download:devo && npm run ts-client && npm run compile && npm run clean-source
scripts.generate:local: curl http://localhost:8080/v2/api-docs -o api/otr-service.json && npm run ts-client && npm run compile && npm run clean-source
